Installing PouchDB is easy. There are a few different ways to do it:

Direct download

Download the latest pouchdb-3.5.0.min.js from the big green button above. Then in your index.html:

<script src="pouchdb-3.5.0.min.js"></script>

Bower

Run this on the command line:

$ bower install pouchdb

Then in your index.html:

<script src="bower_components/pouchdb/dist/pouchdb.min.js"></script>

npm

Run this on the command line:

$ npm install pouchdb

Then in your index.html:

<script src="node_modules/pouchdb/dist/pouchdb.min.js"></script>

jsdelivr CDN

Add this to your index.html:

<script src="//cdn.jsdelivr.net/pouchdb/3.5.0/pouchdb.min.js"></script>

Node.js

Run this on the command line:

$ npm install pouchdb

Then in your JavaScript:

var PouchDB = require('pouchdb');

Next

Now that you have PouchDB installed, let's start working with databases.

  • Working with databases →
